howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three simple steps to beautifully restored faces

items.title: Upload Image
items.description: Easily upload your portrait by dragging and dropping or browsing files. Supported formats include JPG, PNG, and WebP.

items.title: AI Enhancement
items.description: Our advanced AI intelligently restores facial details while preserving overall image quality.

items.title: Download Result
items.description: Preview the enhanced image with our comparison slider and download your restored portrait in high quality.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join countless satisfied users who enhance their portraits with WaveSpeed AI

items.name: Emily Smith
items.comment: I was blown away by how accurately WaveSpeed restored my grandmother's old photos. It's like seeing her youthful self again!

items.name: James Lee
items.comment: As a photographer, I use WaveSpeed to revitalise portraits for clients. The results are simply stunning.

items.name: Emily Smith
items.comment: The restoration quality is top-notch! I love how my family photos look now.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about AI Face Restoration

items.title: What types of facial details can be restored?
items.description: Our AI can restore lost clarity, enhance features, and improve facial expressions, transforming faded or damaged portraits.

items.title: Is using WaveSpeed free?
items.description: Yes! Each user receives 30 free credits daily, allowing you to restore multiple portraits at no cost.

items.title: Can restored images be used commercially?
items.description: Paid subscribers can use restored images for commercial projects. Free-tier users may use them for personal use only.

items.title: How is privacy maintained during the photo restoration?
items.description: All restorations occur in your browser using advanced technology. Your images are never uploaded or stored, ensuring full privacy.

footer.heading: Ready to Elevate Your Portraits?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and witness the transformation for yourself. No sign-up required.
